sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zhèngzài dú běnkē sì niánjí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est en quatrième année de licence.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is in his fourth year of undergraduate studies.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 今年的博览会在上海举行。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jīnnián de bólǎnhuì zài Shànghǎi jǔxíng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'exposition de cette année se tient à Shanghai.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This year's expo is held in Shanghai.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这个标志表示禁止吸烟。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège biāozhì biǎoshì jìnzhǐ xīyān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce panneau indique qu'il est interdit de fumer.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This sign indicates no smoking.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jīnglǐ qīnzì lái jiēdài wǒmen.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le directeur est venu nous accueillir en personne.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The manager came to receive us personally.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他因为食物中毒住院了。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā yīnwèi shíwù zhòngdú zhùyuàn le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a été hospitalisé pour une intoxication alimentaire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He was hospitalized for food poisoning.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这座建筑的设计很独特。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè zuò jiànzhù de shèjì hěn dútè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le design de ce bâtiment est très unique.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The design of this building is very unique.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xuéshēngmen zài cāochǎng shàng pǎobù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les étudiants courent sur le terrain de sport.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The students are running on the playground.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他在比赛中发挥得很好。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zài bǐsài zhōng fāhuī de hěn hǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a très bien joué pendant le match.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He performed very well in the competition.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这种材料是人工合成的。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè zhǒng cáiliào shì réngōng héchéng de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce matériau est synthétique.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This material is artificially synthesized.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Diànnǎo gǎnrǎn le bìngdú.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'ordinateur a été infecté par un virus.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The computer got infected with a virus.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jiàn máoyī de máo hěn ruǎn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La laine de ce pull est très douce.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The wool of this sweater is very soft.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen yào kèfú kùnnán.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons surmonter les difficultés.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We must overcome difficulties.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā yōngyǒu sān tào fángzi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il possède trois maisons.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He owns three houses.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Dàjiā dōu chēng tā wéi Lǎo Wáng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Tout le monde l'appelle Lao Wang.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Everyone calls him Lao Wang.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shuǐ yóu qīng hé yǎng gòuchéng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'eau est composée d'hydrogène et d'oxygène.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Water is composed of hydrogen and oxygen.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Ànjiàn jiāng zài fǎyuàn shěnlǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'affaire sera jugée au tribunal.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The case will be heard in court.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Bié cuī wǒ, wǒ mǎshàng jiù hǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ne me presse pas, j'arrive tout de suite.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Don't rush me, I'll be ready soon.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这首歌唤起了我的记忆。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shǒu gē huànqǐ le wǒ de jìyì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette chanson a évoqué mes souvenirs.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This song evoked my memories.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā xǐhuan xiě shī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il aime écrire des poèmes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He likes to write poems.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zuòrén yào yǒu yuánzé.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: On doit avoir des principes dans la vie.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: One should have principles in life.
